Title: Establishes the "It's Your Data Act"
Summary: Establishes the "It's Your Data Act" for the purposes of providing protections and transparency in the collection, use, retention, and sharing of personal information.
LawCode: Amd §§50 & 51, Civ Rts L; add Art 32-A §§676 - 676-q, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law and the general business law, in relation to establishing the "It's Your Data Act"
